QuestData.Title: In the Business of Souls
QuestData.Description: We will hold our position here while you find and slay the demon responsible for this camp.$b$bEnding Aargoss will not permanently stop this smuggling operation, but it may slow them down long enough for us to find another way to help these people.$b$bGo quickly. He is somewhere atop this ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. Let us leave before they call in reinforcements.
